channel.title: firewall on Everyday Linux
channel.description: Recent content in firewall on Everyday Linux

item.title: OpenShift Firewall
item.description: OpenShift Firewall To add a firewall entry on 3.x, where the firewall installed was iptables rather than firewalld iptables -A OS_FIREWALL_ALLOW -p tcp -m state --state NEW -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
